title: A Shirt Is Worth A Thousand Words
content:
I am a big fan of the current trend of T-shirts with words. Here are some favorites I've found:

[caption id="attachment_4173" align="aligncenter" width="200"] This shirt means "She Is Strong" and I love it. Website: ETSY[/caption]

[caption id="attachment_4174" align="aligncenter" width="300"] Equal parts sassy and true. LOVE IT. Website: ETSY[/caption]

[caption id="attachment_4175" align="aligncenter" width="300"] I'm not even an extreme hiking-girl but this shirt is really great. Website: HUMAN[/caption]

[caption id="attachment_4176" align="aligncenter" width="281"] With winter just around the corner, I can relate with this sweater. Website: HUMAN[/caption]

[caption id="attachment_4177" align="aligncenter" width="185"] YES to eating well, working hard, loving truly, and traveling often! YES also to this website, often sited by my favorite blogger (Katie Did What) Website: Riffraff[/caption]

[caption id="attachment_4178" align="aligncenter" width="185"] More things I love - a white porch, an ocean view, a cozy blanket and espresso! This dreamy sweater reminds me of something [Katie Did What] would wear. Website: Riffraff[/caption]

[caption id="attachment_4179" align="aligncenter" width="281"] But am I right? I really would wear this one. Website: Thuglife[/caption]

[caption id="attachment_4180" align="aligncenter" width="281"] Because I have LAKE HAIR even when I'm not at the lake. I've been into the "natural" look, OK? Website: Thuglife[/caption]

What favorite graphic T's have you found?

XOXO.sarah
